fullplot: Manuel's fantasy travel through Time goes from Long Ago (Episode 1 - O jardim proibido / Le Jardin interdit) through Now (Episode 2 - O pique-nique dos sonhos / Le Pique-nique des rèves), arriving in the Future (Episode 3 - A pequena champeè de xadrez / La Petite Championne d'èchecs).

title: Manuel on the Island of Wonders
